intro.title: Abstract oil paintings in the original technique

offer.description-1: Choose from wide range of art, available right away by special delivery without leaving home.
offer.description-2: Created specially for you, based on selected pattern. Possible color, size, technique modifications.
offer.description-3: esigned from scratch to match your space and style.

about.title: About me
about.description-1: I am a graduate of the Academy of Fine Arts in Gdańsk. In my work, I combine experience in design with a passion for painting.
about.description-2: This unusual combination makes my works balance between precision, minimalism, spontaneity and improvisation.
about.description-3: I work based on my own oil technique, which I have been perfecting over the years, which is characterized by depth of texture, multi-layering and vivid colors.
